content: i came up with this pattern for two reasons 1 i wanted to create a pattern for people that want to make fingerless gloves but haven t yet learned to knit in the round and 2 i wanted to create something with this particular yarn which is really pretty but which has not sold very much in the lys where i work i know that sometimes people need to see a yarn worked up before they realize they d really like to knit with it 1/10/13 updated pattern to include yarn amounts
